name: Nightwatch
storyline: As you step into the shoes of Daniel, a diligent security guard, you find yourself embarking on a night shift like no other. Hired by a new and enigmatic company, you are tasked with the surveillance and protection of their secluded facility. However, you are not alone in this venture; your trusted companion and best friend, Jenny, joins you on this nocturnal journey, communicating with you through a walkie-talkie. Little do you know, the night holds a multitude of secrets waiting to be unraveled.
summary: Nightwatch is a first person mystery game that plays out in the woods of Rivertidecreek. A walking simulator that features choices of dialogues and different puzzles. The artwork will make you feel absorbed in the game.
